description: JB Commercial offers a wide range of commercial grade armchairs suitable for any commercial establishment. From soft fabrics to real leather you will find an armchair that can be styled to complement existing furniture and interiors, with contemporary and classic styles available. Many of the arm chairs can be upholstered in any material and colour of your choice. All items which contain foam and/or fabric are CRIB 5 Certified unless otherwise stated.
